name: 5 Get list of followees (v1.1)
description:
Note. Due to changed access restrictions, access via v1.1. is no longer possible. Use v2 instead. For more information: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/getting-started/about-twitter-api#item0 This preset gives you the followees of users (followees are users an account follows, aka friends or following). Add the numeric user IDs as nodes e.g. "865971338". You can collect the IDs with the preset "2 Get information about users". Alternatively, you can add the screen_name (e.g. "digicademy") and change the parameter "user_id" to "screen_name".

**Login Process**

For standard access with v1 you can login via the "Login to Twitter" button. After that, access tokens are created and you can start fetching data.

**Get the followees**

This preset fetches 100 followees of an account, results are ordered with the most recent following first.  In case you want to fetch more, change the count parameter (maximum per request is 200) or increase the maximum pages. But be aware of rate limits, at the moment, only one request per minute is allowed. The endpoint /friends/ids might help you to go further.

For more information see the Documentation https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/v1/accounts-and-users/follow-search-get-users/api-reference/get-friends-list

**Differences between v1.1 & v2**

Please remind that Twitter provides different API versions (https://developer.twitter.com/en/products/twitter-api). Facepager presets are available for API version 1 (v1) and API version 2 (v2). Each version comes with different access levels and limits. In the corresponding presets you will find information about how to work with API version 2.
